page.title: 09Shops in Horsmonden
page.content: There are 4 general stores in Horsmonden, and they are Heath Stores, Crowhursts, Brenda's and Crossway's which mostly sells groceries and is tiny. Heath Stores is starting to sell haberdashery, which is things like wool, zips and dresses, and Crowhurst is the only shop in the village to sell newspapers. The other shops in the village are the Hairdresser, Charlie Bromley the butcher, who also sells fruit and vegetables, the Garage, which sells petrol, hardware, plants, and sweets, the Chemist which does prescriptions, sells toiletries and medicine and the Post Office which also sells paperbacks, and stationery. The Heath Stores, Crowhurst, Brenda's and the Garage have recently changed hands. Charlie the butcher's has been in the same family since 1919
